data.eml:eml: A new species of Nanochromis (Teleostei: Cichlidae) from Lake Mai Ndombe, central Congo Basin, Democratic Republic of Congo

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schliewen, Ulrich K., Stiassny, Melanie L. J. (2006): A new species of Nanochromis (Teleostei: Cichlidae) from Lake Mai Ndombe, central Congo Basin, Democratic Republic of Congo. Zootaxa 1169: 33-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.2645571
